long_description: Carrying your boots can be so easy-just slip the nylon cord loop through your boot buckles and grab the wooden handle. Eco-conscious carrier is constructed in the United States using Lyptus(R) hardwood, which is derived from certified sustainable eucalyptus plantations in Brazil. Eucalyptus trees grow quickly and can be harvested within 14 to 16 years of planting. T-grip handle is comfortable and easy to grab. Fits in your pocket when not in use.
short_description: Carrying your boots can be so easy-just slip the nylon cord loop through your boot buckles and grab the wooden handle.
